title: Most tech stacks weren‚Äôt built for AI - and IT leaders are feeling the pressure.
description:
Most tech stacks weren‚Äôt built for AI - and IT leaders are feeling the pressure.

On this episode of Edge of IT, host Jonathan Gough chats with Stuart Miniman of Red Hat and Andrew Tenaglia of Pellera about what true modernization really takes.

They get candid about:
- Tackling tech debt that slows innovation
- Moving beyond ‚Äúlift and shift‚Äù thinking
- Building cloud-native foundations that AI can actually thrive on
